import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, Container } from 'reactstrap' const EditApartment = props => { const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false) const [error, setError] = useState(false) const [form, setForm] = useState({ street_number: props.apt.street_number, city: props.apt.city, state: props.apt.state, zip: props.apt.zip, country: props.apt.country, building_manager: props.apt.building_manager, phone: props.apt.phone, hours: props.apt.hours, image_url: props.apt.image_url, subject: props.apt.subject, description: props.apt.description }) const updateApartment = apt => { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/apartments/${props.apt.id}`, { body: JSON.stringify(apt), headers:{ "Content-Type": "application/json" }, method: "PATCH" }) .then(response => { if (response.ok) setSuccess(true) else setError(true) }).catch(error => { console.log("error:",error) }) } const handleChange = e => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(form) updateApartment(form) } return( <>

Edit your apartment listing.

Home Back to listing profile
) } export default EditApartment
